BR_text.BRsummary: Build fails for want of xxd
BR_text.BRdescription: Need to include the xxd command as a dependency shown in BUILD.md. In Gentoo Linux it's provided by app-editors/vim; other distros may vary but I suspect it's the case across the board.

comments_0.comment_text:
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MincingWords>@MincingWords</denchmark-link>
 , this is a known issue. I'll add it in BUILD.md.
